generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with visible lane markings and tram tracks, indicating it is a road.
- sidewalk: There are pedestrian walkways on both sides of the road, separated from the road by curbs or poles.
- building: A building is visible on the right side of the image, partially obscured by trees.
- vegetation: Numerous trees and greenery are visible along both sides of the road.
- sky: A portion of the sky is visible through the tree canopy.
- person: Several people are visible walking on the sidewalk.
- car: A silver car is visible on the left side of the road.
- bus: Two buses are visible on the road, one red and one white.
- train: The buses are on tracks, indicating they are a form of train (tram).
- motorcycle: No motorcycles are visible.
- bicycle: No bicycles are visible.
- truck: No trucks are visible.
- rider: No riders are visible.
- wall: No individual standing walls are visible.
- fence: No fences are visible.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including traffic light poles and sign poles.
- traffic light: Traffic lights are visible at various intersections.
- traffic sign: Several traffic signs are visible, including a blue directional sign and a stop sign.
